body: Culture and CompanyWe are a team motivated to create best of breed software using latest technology to satisfy our partners needs. We develop software that help streamline the business, we believe that technology and our software can truly help our customers optimize their processes and workflows and help them gain market and recognition.Number of opened positions : 6Requirements- Knowledge of ASP.NET MVC RAZOR- Knowledge of HTML, CSS, jquery, angular- Knowledge of .NET Framework (C#, Entity Framework)- Knowledge of Microsoft SQL Server (database design, triggers, stored procedures, entity framework)Nice to have :- Knowledge of knockout, bootstrap, less, require.js- Mobile technologies is a plus (phonegap, jquerymobile, native development for Android and iOS)- IoC frameworks- Sharepoint and SSRS development frameworks and servers- Familiar with TDD development practices- Knowledge of object oriented technologies and Microsoft technologies, n-tier applications, distributed applications, SOA.- Experience with multiple browser based development .- University / Bachelorâ€™s Degree with 1+ years of experience as a web developer in asp.net/MVC- Excellent oral and written communication skills and good command of English- Ability to adapt and work both independently or as part of a team- Good documentation skills.Benefits:- Outstanding salary conditions- 24 vacation days plus all national holidays- Central location - close to Unirii Square with easy parking solutions- Working in a friendly environment with a flexible program- Working with new technologies on interesting enterprise level projects
title: ASP.NET MVC Web Software Developer
